Audio.Locality: La Luchata, above Galan, Serrania de los Yariguies, Santander
Audio.Author: Thomas Donegan
Audio.Comments: ref: Donegan TM, Avendaño JE, Briceño ER & Huertas BC. 2007. Bird range extensions with taxonomic and ecological notes from Serranía de los Yariguíes, Colombias new National Park. Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club 127(3): 172-213. We have various other recordings.
